hackathon-description-text: Each month, UC San Diego students will be able to create a project in response to the month's [PROM]pt and have the chance to take the throne of best Project of the Month! Think of it like a hackathon, but on the time scale of a full month. The [PROM]pt of the month and winners of the previous month will be honorably posted in a display case in our computer science labs!
hackathon-eligibility: Teams can be a maximum of 4 students, and must be composed of all UCSD students.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=University of California San Diego, 9500 Gilman Drive, La Jolla, CA 92093, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is your idea a creative and innovation solution to a problem?
How did you go about executing your idea? Does the actual product match the idea, and to what degree?
How have you presented your idea? Is it clear what you are working on and why it is a useful product?
How relevant is your idea to the given [PROM]pt?

hackathon-location-address: University of California San Diego, 9500 Gilman Drive, La Jolla, CA 92093, USA
hackathon-description-header: UC San Diego  ||  CSES  ||  [PRO] ject of the [M]onth
